official_title: Expressing the congratulations of the House of Representatives to Mr. Donald Richard Newkirk of Worthington, Ohio, on the occasion of his 30th anniversary with the Ohio Hospital Association and his retirement from such association, and offering its best wishes to him, his wife Peggy, and their children.

summary.text: Congratulates Donald Richard Newkirk on his 30th anniversary with, and his retirement from, the Ohio Hospital Association.

titles.title: Expressing the congratulations of the House of Representatives to Mr. Donald Richard Newkirk of Worthington, Ohio, on the occasion of his 30th anniversary with the Ohio Hospital Association and his retirement from such association, and offering its best wishes to him, his wife Peggy, and their children.
